item.title: Making blog posting easier
item.description: Another piece of advice that I’ve heard over and over again is to make things easier. Automate! In that vein, I learned a little elisp in order to make it easier to create a new blog post. I create my posts in emacs, but I often cut and paste the YAML header from a previous post, which is tedious and time-consuming. Here is my new posting function: (defun vk-blogpost (title) "Create a new blog post.
